  • pattern LMSplitRight :: s -> Leftmost s f h

    • _ssOpen :: !(Path (Trans es) (SliceWrapped ns))
    • _ssDeriv :: ![o]
    }
  • | SSOpen !(Path (Trans es) (SliceWrapped ns)) ![o]
name: SearchState SSFrozen SSSemiOpen SSOpen _ssFrozen _ssMidSlice _ssOpen _ssDeriv

display_html:
data Score s i
  • = SVal !s
  • | SRight !(LeftId i) ![Holes s]
  • | SLeft ![Holes s] !(RightId i)
  • | SBoth !(LeftId i) ![(Holes s, Holes s)] !(RightId i)
name: Score SVal SRight SLeft SBoth

name: Holes

display_html:
data Score s i :: Type where
  • MkScore :: SNat nl -> SNat nr -> TypedScore nl nr s i -> Score s i
name: Score MkScore

display_html:
data TypedScore (nl :: Nat) (nr :: Nat) s i where
  • SVal :: !s -> TypedScore 'Z 'Z s i
  • SRight :: !(LeftId i) -> !(RightHoles nl s) -> TypedScore ('S nl) 'Z s i
  • SLeft :: !(LeftHoles nr s) -> !(RightId i) -> TypedScore 'Z ('S nr) s i
  • SBoth :: !(LeftId i) -> !(BothHoles nl nr s) -> !(RightId i) -> TypedScore ('S nl) ('S nr) s i
name: TypedScore SVal SRight SLeft SBoth
